data.name: Fantasy Climber. Fun Adventure
data.detailed_description:
Conquer the peaks together with Pinky, Snowball and Bluey! Collect fruits, set climbing records and don't fall into the clutches of monsters!

Fantasy Climber is a classic platformer with a modern challenging, a retro pixel art look and a perfect controls! Jump higher, move faster and enjoy the satisfaction of compleeting challenges. Are you ready to climb?

‚≠ê Hone your lifting skills and defeat all enemies at different levels! Solve puzzles, be smart and pass all levels as fast as posible!‚≠ê

data.short_description: Fantasy Climber - is a classic platformer with modern design, honed game mechanics and retro aestetics. Each peak prepares new surprises and increases the difficulty of climbing!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 1.4GHz or faster
